name: Space Battle Simulator (Breakchain)
description:
Commandeer a starship and destroy the enemy fleet! Evade asteroids, ram enemy ships, and blow them apart with your turrets.

To play the game, unzip and run the exe file.

Controls

Esc - Quit
Plus/Minus - Adjust resolution
Shift/Ctrl - Thrust
WASD - Pitch and yaw
QE - Roll
Click (hold) - Fire turrets
Scroll - Zoom

Requirements

CPU: Dual Core 64-bit
GPU: OpenGL 4.5 (AMD RX570 or higher recommended)
VRAM: Scales with resolution (2GB recommended)
OS: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10 x64

Features

Fully path-traced graphics engine - unlimited light sources and one bounce of global illumination.
Rigidbody physics simulation - all objects are dynamic and destructible.
3D spatialized audio  - HRTF available for headphones users.

Future Updates

- Temporal denoising and importance sampling
- Major performance improvements
- More detailed battle mechanics and tactics
- Different maps
- Wide variety of ships
- Multiplayer
